===Etymology===
{{Han simp|點|f=黑|t=灬}}. Note that 黑 changed from being on the left to being 灬, underneath. Compare [[黙]] (from [[默]]), which retains the [[里]], and [[黒]], which is the simplification in isolation.

Current form is graphically {{Han compound|占|灬}}.
